ProductInfo.Features:
a cute mobile phone and GPS tracker phone for kids or teenagers
It provides not only a unique way for your children to make or receive calls, but also a safety GPS tracker for parents
Auto SMS message sent to guardian numbers when watch enters/leaves waypoint locations
Up to 4 Guardian/parental numbers saved for notifications/querries
if phone watch is connected to parents phone over bluetooth and is separated by over 10 meters, a message will automatically be sent to the phone
ProductInfo.Name: Kids Wrist Watch Unlocked Cell Phone GPS Tracker GSM GPRS SOS Wrist Watch SmartPhone MP3 Bluetooth Tethering For Boys(Blue)
